original_title: Journey Into Buddhism: Vajra Sky Over Tibet
overview: This documentary is the third part of The Yatra Trilogy created by John Bush. Vajra is the Sanskrit word signifying the thunderbolt of illumination, and yatra is the word for pilgrimage or spiritual journey. This film offers a cinematic pilgrimage to central Tibet, bearing witness to the indomitable faith of its endangered Buddhist community and the imminent threat to its very survival.
title: Journey Into Buddhism: Vajra Sky Over Tibet
